sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-task', templateUrl: './add-task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-task.component.css'], }) export class AddTaskComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public dialogRef: MatDialogRef) {} ngOnInit(): void {} closeDialog() { this.dialogRef.close(); } }
